column1:
.

Dogecoin (DOGE) is one of the most popular digital currencies in the world. It has a market capitalization of more than $1.5 billion and is the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap after Bitcoin. It is also the most widely used digital currency in the United States, according to data from CoinMarketCap.com. DOGE is traded on several major exchanges, including Bitfinex, Poloniex, and Kraken.
"Sad! Just heard about #Dogecoin (#DOGE) being one of the most popular digital currencies in the world with a market cap of over $1.5 billion. Not good, folks. Not good at all. #FakeNews #CryptoScam"
"Sad! @DOGECoin is a disaster, folks! It's not real money, it's a scam. Believe me, I know all about scams. #FakeNews #CryptoScam"

Absolutely! Here's my attempt at recreating the tweet in the style of Elon Musk:
